div.p: This value set expansion contains 2 concepts.

td.a: Polio birth dose (a zero dose) was administered-146

tr.td: Polio birth dose (a zero dose) was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Poliovirus-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Dose 0" AND "Birth dose" = TRUE) = 1

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SPolioBirthDose for IMMZ.D18.S.Polio.Birth dose schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a poliovirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Birth dose schedule (in countries that are poliomyelitis (polio)-endemic countries or countries at high risk for importation and subsequent spread of polio that follow the combined bivalent oral polio vaccine [bOPV]–inactivated polio vaccine [IPV] schedule)
